translation.en: All right, hold on. Let's scoop that midrange.
Stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, stop, stop.
I was just-- You said play something fast.
Did you read the music that I wrote for you?
Do you know what polyrhythms are?
These aren't my drums. They belong to Hunter.
translation.es: La batería no es mía. Es de Hunter.

translation.en: And he came up with the band name. I don't play the drums, I play the drum.
translation.es: Él le puso nombre a la banda. No toco la batería. Toco el tambor.

translation.en: This drum, in marching band for two years.
translation.es: El tambor de la banda. Desde hace dos años.

translation.en: I do it to get out of PE, but Hunter says that doesn't matter.
translation.es: Es para no ir a Educación Física, pero Hunter dice que no importa.

translation.en: All it takes to be great is commitment and sacrifice,
translation.es: Solo hace falta compromiso y sacrificio.

translation.en: which is what metal's all about.
translation.es: De eso se trata el heavy metal.

translation.en: or sticking it to the man, or denim, or motorcycles, or speed,
translation.es: o revelarse, o el jean, las motos, la velocidad.

translation.en: I don't totally understand it, but Hunter says I don't have to.
translation.es: No entiendo mucho, pero Hunter dice que hace falta.

translation.en: All I have to do is--
- Mm. - A bass player will be huge for us.
Emily, can I talk to you for a second?
The song you're playing is not the song they are playing.
translation.es: No tocas la misma canción que ellos.

translation.en: I'm not sure you're even playing a march.
translation.es: Ni siquiera sé si es una marcha.

translation.en: We've talked about this. You have to listen and play.
translation.es: Ya lo hablamos. Debes escuchar y tocar.

translation.en: It's an orchestra, right? I know we're in a marching band, but--
translation.es: Es una orquesta. Sé que es una banda, pero…

translation.en: Fuck! I don't give a fuck about what I'm playing!
translation.es: ¡Me importa un carajo lo que toco!

translation.en: I don't give a fuck about what they're playing!
translation.es: ¡Me importa una mierda lo que tocan!
¡Al carajo con tu banda de mierda!

translation.en: - Too bad she can't play like she throws. - I don't give a fuck, so fuck you!
translation.es: - Ojalá tocara como lanza. - ¡Me importa una mierda!

translation.en: You can't say that in America.
That seems pretty metal to me, but I'm not sure.
translation.es: Eso me pareció muy metalero, pero no sé.

translation.en: He's been into many things since I met him,
but he's stuck with metal longer than any of them.
translation.es: pero lleva más tiempo con el metal.

translation.en: When his mom left in seventh grade, he decided it was the key to everything.
translation.es: Consideró que la partida de su madre era la clave de todo.

translation.en: If we devote ourselves to metal, we'll own this school.
translation.es: Si nos dedicamos al metal, arrasaremos.

translation.en: Everybody will see what we really are and worship us like gods.
translation.es: Todos verán lo que somos y nos idolatrarán.

translation.en: I'm willing to give it a try.

translation.es: Hunter es mi amigo desde que evitó que Molly

translation.en: ever since he stopped Molly Levine from pulling out my hair in third grade.
translation.es: Hunter es mi amigo desde que evitó que Molly me arrancara el pelo en tercer grado.

translation.en: He always looks out for me.

translation.es: Skip Hoffman es un hijo de puta.

translation.en: I don't think he was trying to hit me. I was just in the way.
translation.es: No creo que quisiera golpearme. Estaba en su camino.

translation.en: - Clay Moss. - You ready for the game?
What I'm ready for is your homecoming after- party, man.
translation.es: Y para tu fiesta luego de la reunión de exalumnos.

translation.en: Yep, my parents are in Geneva.
So bring the whole school if you want, man, seriously.
translation.es: Invita a toda la escuela si quieres.

translation.en: - Tell whoever. Everybody's invited. - All right.
Asked your mom about the double bass kit?
translation.es: ¿Le preguntaste a tu mamá del doble bombo?

translation.en: She said she doesn't have a thousand dollars.
Okay, well, what about a double bass pedal?
Won't get the resonance, but we'll have that attack.
Yeah, she said she doesn't have $150 either.
She's in my speech class. I think she's English.
translation.es: Está en Oratoria conmigo. Creo que es inglesa.

translation.en: I heard she went apeshit on the band teacher.
translation.es: Se enfureció con el profesor de la banda.

translation.en: I've never been to a party.
I always wondered what people like this did at them.
translation.es: Quería saber qué hacía en ellas

translation.en: People whose bands didn't have names like Skullfucker.
translation.es: la gente con bandas con nombres distintos de Skullfucker.

translation.en: in the middle of it all.
This is like three chords and they still can't get it right. They suck.
translation.es: Son tres acordes y no les salen. Son horribles.

translation.en: Look at the drummer. - He's high out of his mind. -
I mean, them, all of them. How did they just… do this,
translation.es: Me refiero a todos. ¿Cómo pueden hacer esto,

translation.en: like it's the easiest thing ever?
Okay, listen to me. Things are gonna happen for us.
Someday, all these people are gonna be like,
Holy shit! Kevin Schlieb and Hunter Sylvester?
I went to high school with those guys.
translation.es: Fui a la preparatoria con ellos.

translation.en: I could've even hung out with them, maybe.
But it's gonna be too late,
'cause we're gonna be too busy hanging out with the guys from Iron Maiden.
translation.es: Quizá estemos pasando tiempo con los de Iron Maiden.

translation.en: Hunter, it's not that bad, actually, once you get used to it. Seriously.
translation.es: No está tan mal cuando te acostumbras. En serio.

translation.en: Hunter, seriously, our band is gonna be so awesome.
translation.es: Hunter, de verdad. Nuestra banda será genial.

translation.en: I'm gonna practice like five hours a day. I'm gonna be better than Ringo Starr.
translation.es: Practicaré cinco horas al día. Seré mejor que Ringo Starr.

translation.en: - I'll drive you home when you're finished. - After. After pee- pee.
translation.es: - Y luego te llevaré a tu casa. - Sí, luego de hacer pis.

translation.en: Because you're pretty. Why else do people stare at you?
translation.es: Eres bonita. ¿Por qué otra cosa te mirarían?

translation.en: Why don't they? I could give you a million reasons.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué no? - Podría darte un millón de razones.

translation.en: I am talking to a girl. I'm not even afraid of her.
translation.es: Estoy hablándole a una chica y no le tengo miedo.

translation.en: This party was a great idea. I don't care what Hunter says.
translation.es: Venir fue genial. No importa qué diga Hunter.

translation.en: - And my nose… - Even he must be having fun right now.
translation.es: - Mi nariz… - Seguro que se divierte.

translation.en: Hey, he just called you a dipshit.
- No. No, I-- - What did you call me?
I didn't say anything to anybody. I swear. Yes, you did.
translation.es: - No le dije nada a nadie. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: That's why they don't stare at me.
Her? I could've stared at her.
I-- I don't-- I don't know either of you. I'm an impartmentege.
translation.es: No conozco a ninguna. Soy impartidal.

translation.en: Are you good, bruh? You hurt?
- Here, let me help you. - No, no. Let me help you.
translation.es: - Déjame ayudarte. - Yo te ayudaré a ti.

translation.en: I'm sorry that you feel that way. Do you play?
Me and my friend over here. A real band.
translation.es: Él y yo tenemos una banda de verdad.

translation.en: A serious band. Not like you fucktards.
translation.es: Una en serio. No como ustedes, idiotas.

translation.en: Got it. Um, I guess we'll be seeing you at the Battle of the Bands then.
translation.es: Bien, supongo que los veré en la Batalla de las Bandas.

translation.en: There hasn't been a Battle of the Bands since Dave Migdall hung brain on stage.
translation.es: La última fue cuando Dave Migdall mostró las bolas.

translation.en: Go sign up with Dean Swanson, but maybe don't say fucktard,
translation.es: Anótense con la decana Swanson, pero no le digas idiota.
Es embajadora de las Olimpíadas Especiales.

translation.en: All right, guys. Let's keep this party going! Give me your car keys.
translation.es: - Continuemos con la fiesta. - Dame las llaves del auto.

translation.en: If you'd like to wait until I am done with the Merinos--
translation.es: Espera a que termine con los Merino…

translation.en: I demand you let us compete in the Battle of the Bands.
translation.es: Exijo competir en la Batalla de las Bandas.

translation.en: Not letting us play just because we're a post- death metal band
translation.es: Prohibirnos estar por tocar post-death metal

translation.en: would be a complete violation of our First Amendment rights.
Your First Amendment rights as a minor are unclear,
translation.es: Tus derechos como menor no están del todo en claro,

translation.en: but I agree it would be wrong to exclude you.
translation.es: pero coincido en que está mal excluirlos.

translation.en: So why didn't anybody tell us about it?
- I wasn't aware you had a death metal-- - Post- death.
translation.es: - No sabía que tocaban death… - Post-death.

translation.en: as long as your performance is appropriate.
translation.es: siempre y cuando lo que ejecuten sea apropiado.

translation.en: I had to work on her, but we're in.
So I guess we should start looking for a bass player, huh?
Battle of the Bands is where it starts for people. Check it out.
translation.es: La Batalla de las Bandas es el principio. Mira.

translation.en: Guitarist and singer of Kiloton, Battle of the Bands winners 1996.
translation.es: Guitarrista y cantante de Kilotón, ganador de Batalla de las Bandas 1996.

translation.en: No one in this school liked heavy music same as now,
translation.es: A nadie le gustaba el rock pesado,

translation.en: but Kiloton terrorized their way straight to victory.
translation.es: pero Kilotón triunfó a puro terror.

translation.en: they were considered the greatest unsigned metal band in the country.
translation.es: eran la mejor banda de metal independiente del país.

translation.en: They could have been right up there with Metallica or Pantera,
translation.es: Podrían haber estado con Metallica o Pantera,
Creo que se debió al alcohol.

translation.en: But you and me, that's not gonna happen to us.
This is our moment. Heavy music is gonna rise up.
translation.es: Es nuestro momento. El heavy metal resurgirá.

translation.en: We win the Battle of the Bands, parlay that win into gigs,
and then those gigs score us a deal.
Cocks. Okay. I've gotta get all the way to C Hall.
translation.es: Mierda. Debo ir a la sala C.

translation.en: But, um, meet me after school. We've got work to do.
translation.es: Nos vemos a la salida. Hay mucho que hacer.

translation.en: - Hop in. - Where are we going?
It doesn't seem metal to ask if he's got his dad's permission, - so I won't. -
translation.es: No es metalero preguntar si su padre lo autorizó, y no lo haré.

translation.en: This definitely seems metal, right? I mean, I think it does.
translation.es: Esto sí es metalero, ¿no? Bueno, yo creo que sí.

translation.en: I'm not sure my mom and dad will.
translation.es: No sé qué dirán mis padres.

translation.en: These drums are gonna be huge for us.
If you drop your brother off first.
translation.es: Si llevas a tu hermano primero.

translation.en: Your father will pick him up between shifts.
translation.es: Tu padre irá por él entre turnos.

translation.en: I'm the best at crawl, and I can tread water the second longest.
translation.es: Soy el mejor en crol y soy el segundo en flotar más tiempo.

translation.en: And I can do the best cannonball, everybody says.
translation.es: Y todos dicen que soy el mejor en salto bomba.

translation.en: I thought you were a clarinet player.
That was just so I could do marching band instead of PE.
translation.es: Era para no ir a Educación Física.

translation.en: I saw you on the field.
I hadn't taken my meds for, like…  …a week.
translation.es: Hacía una semana que no tomaba mis medicinas.

translation.en: Do you like… heavy metal at all?
I don't know what that is.
And the Slippers of Spider Climbing go to Malmsteen of Gorgoroth.
translation.es: Las botas de trepar como araña son para Malmsteen de Gorgoroth.

translation.en: What kind of girlie name is Malmsteen of Gorgoroth?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de nombre de niña es Malmsteen de Gorgoroth?

translation.en: I don't know, Dad. Why don't you ask one of your real housewives
translation.es: Pregúntale a alguna de tus amas de casa

translation.en: while you're shoving water balloons into their tits?
translation.es: mientras les metes globos en las tetas.

translation.en: I understand Dungeons & Dragons even less than metal,
translation.es: Al Calabozos & Dragones lo entiendo menos que al metal,

translation.en: but it's a chance for us to hang out with new people,
translation.es: pero nos permite conocer gente nueva.

translation.en: especially ones who play the bass.
translation.es: Sobre todo gente que toca el bajo.

translation.en: If he joins Skullfucker, then we're a band, right?
translation.es: Si se une a Skullfucker, somos una banda, ¿no?

translation.en: - So we can play Battle of the Bands. -
translation.es: Tocaríamos en la Batalla de las Bandas.

translation.en: If people like us, maybe they'll ask us to play some parties.
translation.es: Si gustamos, quizá nos pidan tocar en fiestas.

translation.en: I hope Hunter likes this guy.
translation.es: Ojalá le caiga bien a Hunter.

translation.en: Sometimes he's not so nice to people when he's uncomfortable.
translation.es: No es simpático cuando está incómodo.

translation.en: Being around his dad makes him--
that a halfling rogue would be dumb and ungrateful enough
translation.es: que un rebelde mediano sea tan desagradecido

translation.en: to try and rip off a half- orc barbarian
translation.es: como para intentar estafar a un bárbaro semiorco

translation.en: who just saved him from five ice toads.
translation.es: que lo salvó de cinco sapos de hielo.

translation.en: But he thinks he'll show mercy.
Until he remembers that mercy is for the weak.
Malmsteen pulls out Hell Slinger, his +3 great sword…
translation.es: Malmsteen saca su gran espada de tres bonus…

translation.en: …and he tells Auriac Stormhollow to shut his glory hole
translation.es: …y le dice a Auriac Stormhollow que cierre la puta boca

translation.en: before he starts his first attack.
translation.es: antes de hacer su primer ataque.

translation.en: - Plus ten, that's a hit. - Hunter, don't be an idiot.
translation.es: - Más diez, genial. - Hunter, no seas idiota.

translation.en: He runs the blade between the thief's ribs.
translation.es: Le clava la espada a los ladrones en las costillas.

translation.en: Head over to Dr. Sylvester's for some post- op implants,
translation.es: Pide al Dr. Sylvester un implante,

translation.en: because I just chopped off your dick.
You just remember that those implants are what paid for your guitar,
translation.es: Recuerda que los implantes pagaron tu guitarra,

translation.en: and all your dumbass Satan- worship T- shirts!
Did you see my American Express?
This sucks compared to Call of Duty. Kevin, see you in class.
translation.es: Esto es peor que Call of Duty. Kevin, nos vemos en clase.

translation.en: Hunter, we were going to ask him to play bass for us.
translation.es: Hunter, íbamos a pedirle que fuera nuestro bajista.

translation.en: It's for the best. We can never trust a guy like that.
translation.es: Es lo mejor. No podemos confiar en un tipo así.

translation.en: I'm telling you, she's really good.
translation.es: Te digo que es muy buena.

translation.en: We need a bass player. A metal bass player.
translation.es: Necesitamos un bajista de heavy metal.

translation.en: That's the most ridiculous thing I've ever heard.
Why? Why is that the most ridiculous thing you've ever heard?
Because a cello- playing girl is so non- metal
translation.es: Una violonchelista es tan poco metalera

translation.en: that even thinking about it is evaporating my balls.
translation.es: Una violonchelista es tan poco metalera que se me secan las bolas.

translation.en: A lot of the time, Hunter, I don't know what you're talking about.
translation.es: Muchas veces no te comprendo, Hunter.

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not right for Skullfucker.
Slide over. Open the door, but don't get out.
translation.es: Pásate, abre la puerta, pero no bajes.

translation.en: - Did you get her number? - Of course I got it.
I know I said I'd get her number, but I got her Snapchat.
- No, no, no, no. - It's fine.
- It's the same thing. - It's not the same thing. You know it.
translation.es: - Es lo mismo. - No es lo mismo.

translation.en: Why? Why did you do that?
Drive. If he gets close enough, you're just as fucked as I am.
translation.es: Conduce. Si se acerca, estamos en problemas.

translation.en: You slow down, you die. That's metal.
translation.es: Si vas despacio, mueres. Eso es metal.

translation.en: That is a dumb Keanu Reeves movie!
translation.es: Es una estúpida película de Keanu Reeves.

translation.en: Watch out. He'll see you in the mirrors if he gets close enough.
translation.es: Cuidado. Te verá si se acerca.

translation.en: What am I doing? Oh, God!
Okay. We can shake him. - Turn left on Aspen. -
translation.es: Deshagámonos de él. A la izquierda en Aspen.

translation.en: - Don't slow down. Keep going straight. - To where? Where?
- There! - I… We will not fit in there!
and speaking truth to power, and sticking it to the man, and speed.
translation.es: rebelarse al poder, resistirse y velocidad.
El metal es tomar el volante.

translation.en: Do lines of it in the bathroom.
It's the solo to Machinery. It fucking shreds.
translation.es: El solo de Maquinaria. Es genial.

translation.en: I'll get to work on this, then.
Maybe Hunter'll change his mind about her when I tell him how much she shreds.
translation.es: Quizá Hunter cambie de parecer cuando le diga lo bien que toca.

translation.en: These are two of the most important tools in your communications toolbox.
translation.es: Son dos herramientas importantes de la comunicación.

translation.en: Enunciation is the way we shape the sounds that come out of our mouths.
translation.es: La enunciación es la forma que les damos a nuestras expresiones.

translation.en: Dean Swanson wants to see Hunter Sylvester.
translation.es: La decana Swanson quiere ver a Hunter Sylvester.

translation.en: They only got suspended two weeks.
Swanson wanted a month, but their ass- rapist coach intervened.
translation.es: Swanson quería un mes, pero intervino su puto entrenador.

translation.en: They can't come back to campus or anything.
But when they come back, they'll totally ass- rape me for getting them suspended in the first place.
translation.es: Sí, pero cuando vuelvan, me violarán por hacerlos suspender.

translation.en: Getting them suspended? It's their fault.
I flicked him in the chops first.
Okay, well, at Clay Moss's party,
translation.es: En la fiesta de Clay Moss,

translation.en: they pushed you into the speaker in front of everybody. They started it.
translation.es: te empujaron contra el parlante. Ellos empezaron.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think your average suburban Nazi shitbag is gonna see it that way.
translation.es: No creo que esos nazis de mierda lo vean de ese modo.

translation.en: It's cool. Yeah, it's cool. Yeah.
Yeah, I kind of look like Jason Newsted from Metallica, the bass player.
translation.es: Me parezco a Jason Newsted, el bajista de Metallica.

translation.en: Oh, right, the one who got fired.

translation.es: Como la mascota de la escuela.

translation.en: No. No, not like the school mascot.
translation.es: Como la mascota de la escuela no.

translation.en: Less like the school mascot than anything on Earth.
More like a baby's dick than the school mascot.
translation.es: Más como el pene de un bebé.

translation.en: If a baby's dick grew its own baby dick, then my hair would be more like--
translation.es: Si a un bebé le saliera un pene, mi cabello sería…

translation.en: Sorry I'm so late. Glad you guys are still here.
translation.es: Perdón por llegar tarde. Me alegra que sigan aquí.

translation.en: Well, how about you guys start playing and I'll work my way in.
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si tocan, y yo me sumo?

translation.en: How far have you gone in the… the thing--
Yeah. I… I got through Metallica, Judas Priest.
I'm in the middle of Slayer right now and I'm having a little bit of trouble--
translation.es: Estoy con Slayer, pero me cuesta…

translation.en: Let's try For Whom the Bell Tolls. Okay? You got it, Kev?
translation.es: Con For Whom the Bell Tolls. ¿La tienes, Kev?

translation.en: One, two, three, four. One, two.
translation.es: Uno, dos, tres, cuatro. Uno, dos.

translation.en: Yeah. Okay, cool. All right, man.
That was cool. Le-- Um, let's try playing the song.
Let's try playing the song, and we can see how we vibe together as a band,
translation.es: Toquémosla y veamos qué onda tenemos como banda.

translation.en: and then we'll work on all the stage- show elements later.
translation.es: Luego trabajaremos en los elementos del show.

translation.en: Um, I'm, like, kind of getting confused, 'cause I just don't know what else to do.
translation.es: Estoy confundido. No sé qué más hacer.

translation.en: Dude, you can play, or you can be wasted,
but you can't play wasted. It's not working out.
translation.es: pero no toques drogado. No funciona.

translation.en: We don't need a bass player to beat those stooges.
translation.es: No necesitamos un bajista para ganarles.

translation.en: Weak. No, here, check this out.
It means that we wouldn't have to split our contest winnings three ways…
translation.es: No repartiríamos las ganancias entre tres.

translation.en: It doesn't feel like a good time to tell Hunter
translation.es: No es momento para decirle a Hunter

translation.en: that I don't wanna be in a band that sounds like people being tortured.
translation.es: que no quiero estar en una banda que suena a gente torturada.

translation.en: But I think it's time for him to seriously consider the only good option we have.
translation.es: Pero puede considerar la única buena opción que tenemos.

translation.en: It is time to speak truth to power.
We have, like, two weeks, and she can learn everything in two days.
translation.es: Tenemos dos semanas, y puede aprender todo en dos días.

translation.en: It's just you're not consistent with the image we're trying to project…
translation.es: No concuerdas con la imagen que queremos proyectar.

translation.en: Is it because she's a girl?
Um, the-- What about The Runaways? That's Joan Jett.
- Okay. Well, there's Lita Ford. - That's The Runaways.
translation.es: - Y está también Lita Ford. - Es de The Runaways.

translation.en: And there's, um… There's, uh… What's her-- Um…
- What's the one with the song… - Kevin.
Kevin, we are a metal band.
We are not an indie metal band. We are not an alt- metal band.
translation.es: Ni metal indie ni alternativo ni una especie de heavy metal.

translation.en: We are not a sort of metal band. We are a metal band.
translation.es: Ni metal indie ni alternativo ni una especie de heavy metal. Es heavy metal.

translation.en: And for us to have a cello player instead of a bass player would be completely gay.
translation.es: Y tener una chelista en vez de un bajista sería totalmente gay.

translation.en: You've gotta take all that in context.
translation.es: Debes tomar todo eso en cuenta.

translation.en: Gay? Our band is called Skullfucker.
You named it that to impress girls?
We're gonna die virgins in a band called Skullfucker.
translation.es: Moriremos vírgenes si nos llamamos así.

translation.en: What I meant was, we're not--
Oh, come on. Like she didn't know.
translation.es: Por favor, como si ella no supiera.

translation.en: Uh, hey, I… wanted to apologize
again for Hunter being so rude, and…
translation.es: por lo grosero que fue Hunter.

translation.en: - That stuff he said. He-- - It's okay.
translation.es: - Lo que dijo fue… - No importa.

translation.en: I was talking about that stuff he said about girl cello players
translation.es: No, me refería a cuando dijo que ser chelista metalera es algo gay.

translation.en: in a metal band being gay.
translation.es: que ser chelista metalera es algo gay.

translation.en: First of all, that's a totally messed up thing to say.
translation.es: Es de locos decir algo así.

translation.en: No, he's not, and… you're not.
translation.es: No la tiene, y tú no lo eres.

translation.en: Are we talking gayness, or heavy metal, or virginity?
translation.es: ¿Hablamos de ser gay, metalera o de ser virgen?

translation.en: All of them, I think. Uh…
I guess there's sort of a spectrum. A virgin.
Do you want to not be?
- You know where Temple Solel is? - On Cleavy? Yeah.
Will you meet me in the car park in a half hour?
translation.es: ¿Nos vemos en el estacionamiento en media hora?

translation.en: Oh, and can you bring thingies?
Well, your father should be back from the shop around 8:00.
translation.es: Tu padre volverá del taller a las 8:00.

translation.en: - And then we-- - Mom, I need the car.
translation.es: - Debemos ir a… - Necesito el auto.

translation.en: I thought it was something. You said it was something.
Well, I was wrong. It was nothing.
I can imagine something being more important than a band practice.
translation.es: Me imagino que fue algo más importante que ensayar.

translation.en: But I definitely can't see how nothing could be more important, Kevin.
translation.es: No sé cómo nada puede ser más importante.

translation.en: I don't need Abbott and Costello from you, okay?
I need a drummer. A real drummer.
mortification of the flesh and all that shit.
translation.es: mortificación de la carne y todo eso.

translation.en: And if you're not gonna be,
if you'll be all girls with cello, showing up whenever I feel like it,
translation.es: y solo te importan las chelistas que aparecen cuando quieren,

translation.en: And we won't win the Battle of the Bands,
translation.es: No ganaremos la Batalla de las Bandas,

translation.en: and then you're gonna be a loser for the rest of your life.
translation.es: y serás un fracasado el resto de tu vida.

translation.en: Where did you learn how to play?
My friend just gave me these songs, and I practiced them.
translation.es: Mi amigo me dio estas canciones y las practico.

translation.en: I'm not, you know, a real drummer or anything.
translation.es: No soy un baterista en serio.

translation.en: Are they all like this? Just pretty much the same beat all the way through?
translation.es: ¿Todas son así, con el mismo ritmo?

translation.en: Please, Kevin. I promised my sister, and she's so psyched to have us play.
translation.es: Por favor. Le prometí a mi hermana que tocaríamos, y está entusiasmada.

translation.en: But Ray's not getting out of rehab for another month,
translation.es: Ray aún tiene para un mes de rehabilitación,

translation.en: and we're tired of playing with a wasted drummer.
translation.es: y estamos hartos de tocar con un baterista drogado.

translation.en: but it's like I said, I'm in this band with Hunter,
translation.es: pero, como les dije, estoy en una banda con Hunter,

translation.en: and Battle of the Bands is really important to him.
translation.es: y la Batalla de las Bandas es importante para él.

translation.en: - Lots of guys are in two bands. - Eric Clapton was in, like, 60 bands.
translation.es: - Muchos tocan en dos bandas. - Clapton estuvo en 60.

translation.en: And I heard you play, man.
You could learn our songs in ten minutes.
translation.es: Aprenderías nuestras canciones en diez minutos.

translation.en: Don't even worry about the Battle of the Bands for now,
translation.es: No te preocupes por la Batalla de las Bandas.
Solo la boda de mi hermana.

translation.en: - Let me think about it. - I feel you.

translation.es: Pero es este fin de semana.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure you're better at staring than me.
translation.es: Eres mejor que yo en mantener la mirada.

translation.en: Let's just, um, lie like this.
On the field, when I first saw you…
translation.es: En el campo, cuando te vi por primera vez…

translation.en: throw stuff and yell at people?
translation.es: arrojar cosas y gritarle a la gente?

translation.en: Feels good to not want to throw stuff and yell at people.
translation.es: Me hace sentir bien no querer arrojarlas y gritar.
Eres mi píldora de la felicidad.

translation.en: Look, you've got to understand something, Kevin. We don't fit in.
translation.es: Trata de entender que no encajamos.

translation.en: You can try as hard as you want. You can get yourself a girlfriend,
or whatever, but you still won't fit in.
She doesn't fit in either. Why can't we all not fit in together?
translation.es: Ella tampoco encaja. No encajemos todos juntos.

translation.en: We're not talking about that now. I don't even wanna go there.
translation.es: No estamos hablando de eso. Ni siquiera deseo ir.

translation.en: We're talking about you being a traitor-- Maybe I wanna talk about it.
I'm the founding member of Skullfucker, and I say no Yokos.
translation.es: Soy miembro fundador, carajo, y no quiero ninguna Yoko.

translation.en: We are both founding members of Skullfucker.
- Don't! - I am way more founding. I write songs, buy equipment, designed our Facebook page--
translation.es: Yo soy más fundador: compongo, compro equipo, diseño nuestro Facebook…

translation.en: I'm the founding member of Skullfucker, and I say no Yokos!
translation.es: Soy yo, carajo, y no quiero Yokos.

translation.en: No, you-- No. You can't just declare end of conversation. You don't have that authority.
translation.es: No puedes decir eso. No tienes autoridad.

translation.en: And that is how you knit a sweater.
translation.es: Y así se teje un suéter.

translation.en: Did you hear how she enunciated and projected?
Get her all the way in the back, right?

translation.es: La muerte le pone fin a todo.

translation.en: Not unbecoming men that strove with gods.
translation.es: Algo no indigno de aquellos que combatieron junto a los dioses.

translation.en: Tennyson's Ulysses. You might know it from your English class.
translation.es: Ulises, de Tennyson. Quizá lo vieron en clase de Inglés.

translation.en: Metal is about what Ulysses was about.
translation.es: El metal y Ulises hablan de lo mismo.
De combatir junto a los dioses.

translation.en: The people that crossed the Bering Strait 12,000 years ago?
translation.es: Los que cruzaron el estrecho de Bering hace 12 000 años…

translation.en: …would've been metal if it weren't for all the Jesus crap.
translation.es: habrían sido metaleros de no ser por Jesús.

translation.en: And Ulysses, what did he do?

translation.es: Lean a Dante. Él les contará.

translation.en: Ulysses got together the baddest ass crew he could find,
translation.es: Ulises reunió la tripulación más ruda que pudo hallar,

translation.en: and then he sailed off beyond the Pillars of Hercules,
translation.es: se aventuró más allá de las Columnas de Hércules,

translation.en: and pulled right down to hell.
What is more metal than that?
So… achieving your dreams with fellow badasses,
translation.es: Luchar por tus sueños junto a tipos rudos como uno,

translation.en: going to hell if you have to…
translation.es: descender al infierno si hace falta…

translation.en: But it wasn't so easy for Ulysses.
translation.es: Pero no fue tan fácil para Ulises.
Ve a trabajar todos los días.

translation.en: He wasted decades of his life on that shit.
translation.es: Desperdició décadas de su vida en esa mierda.

translation.en: But one day, Ulysses decided he was finished with his woman.
translation.es: Pero, un día, Ulises decidió terminar con su mujer.

translation.en: Sooner or later, the metal inside him was bound to rise up…
translation.es: ¡Tarde o temprano el metal dentro de él surgiría

translation.en: …and crush whatever stood in its path!
translation.es: y destruiría lo que obstruyera su paso!

translation.en: - Fucker! Fucking cunt! - You're fucking crazy!
I'll fucking-- I will fucking kill you!
- Don't you ever come near me again! - Ow!
That was inappropriate, bordering on inexcusable.
I completely agree. I'm talking about you.
translation.es: - Estoy de acuerdo. - Hablo de ti.

translation.en: Is that what you've learned from your interactions
with the vicious morons like Skip Hoffman?
translation.es: con idiotas violentos como Skip Hoffman?

translation.en: How to torment people weaker than you?
Look, I've got some personal issues with her--
I could give a shit about your personal issues with that poor girl.
translation.es: Me importan un carajo tus problemas con esa pobre chica.

translation.en: You're going to write down exactly what you did.
If Miss Johnson corroborates your account,
translation.es: Si la Srta. Johnson corrobora tu relato,

translation.en: I'll include it in the disciplinary notice I'll send to your father.
translation.es: lo incluiré en la nota que recibirá tu padre.

translation.en: If she doesn't, I will suspend you.
translation.es: Si no lo corrobora, te suspenderé.

translation.en: You are afraid of everybody, and instead of showing it like I do,
translation.es: Les tienes miedo a todos y, en vez de demostrarlo como yo,

translation.en: you treat everybody like shit and you make them hate you.
translation.es: los tratas para la mierda y te haces odiar.

translation.en: Great. They leave you alone, they leave me alone.
translation.es: Así te dejan en paz y me dejan en paz.

translation.en: Both of us are alone. Mission accomplished.
translation.es: Y los dos estamos solos. Misión cumplida.

translation.en: - No, no, no-- - No, shut up.
You need me a lot more than I need you.
translation.es: Tú me necesitas más que yo a ti.

translation.en: Without me, all of your dumb fantasies disappear.
translation.es: Sin mí, tus tontas fantasías desaparecen.

translation.en: But without you, I might actually live a real life.
translation.es: Pero, sin ti, podría vivir una vida de verdad.

translation.en: Fine. Fine. Go enjoy your new fucking wacko girlfriend
translation.es: Bien, ve a disfrutar de tu novia loca,

translation.en: and your new--- and your new shitty band and--
translation.es: de tu nueva banda de mierda y…

translation.en: It's Hunter's fault. He's a massive dick.
translation.es: Es culpa del idiota de Hunter.

translation.en: But I never would've lost it like that
translation.es: No habría reaccionado así si tomara mis medicinas.

translation.en: - if I hadn't stopped taking my meds. - It was not your fault! Wh--
translation.es: No habría reaccionado así si tomara mis medicinas. ¡No fue tu culpa!

translation.en: You didn't do anything wrong. There's nothing wrong with you.
translation.es: No hiciste nada malo. No te pasa nada.

translation.en: The concentration of serotonin in my synapses is too low.
translation.es: La concentración de serotonina en mis sinapsis es muy baja.

translation.en: Okay, but there's something more wrong with everyone else.
translation.es: Bueno, a los demás les pasan cosas peores.

translation.en: You have a right to be mad, especially at Hunter.
translation.es: Tienes derecho a enojarte, especialmente con Hunter.

translation.en: Everybody else didn't make me like this.
translation.es: No soy así por los demás.

translation.en: Hunter didn't make me like this.
They try as hard as they can.
There may be something… wrong with you, but…
It's because people treat you like you're invisible.
translation.es: Porque te tratan como si fueras invisible.

translation.en: Like you're not even there. Like you're nothing.
translation.es: Como si no estuvieras ahí, como si no fueras nada.

translation.en: But you're more than that. You're better than that.
translation.es: Eres más que eso, mejor que eso.

translation.en: We're done taking shit, you and me.
Take off the costume, Krusty the Clown.
We gotta talk about this, uh, What I did at school today essay right here.
translation.es: Debemos hablar de ese ensayo Lo que hice en la escuela.

translation.en: Sorry, you're just a little late with the whole parenting thing.
No, you ain't. Get the hell out of here.

translation.es: que lucha junto a los dioses?

translation.en: That was great, brother. Really great.
You killed that shit. We never sounded anything like that before.
translation.es: Estuviste fantástico. Nunca sonamos como hoy.

translation.en: I want you to know, man, if…
If you wanna play with us at the Battle of the Bands, we would love to have you.
translation.es: Si quieres tocar con nosotros en la competencia, te aceptamos.

translation.en: I mean, if you just wanna hang, it's… It's all good.
translation.es: Si solo quieres pasar un rato con nosotros, está bien.

translation.en: Yeah, I might take you up on both of those.
Wanna come hang with the other dudes? Yeah. Yes.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres pasar el rato con los demás? - Sí.

translation.en: Let me just finish up here.
You're lucky they didn't press charges. I want my stuff back.
translation.es: - Por suerte, no presentaron cargos. - Deme mis cosas.

translation.en: Weapons confiscated from a minor at the time of an arrest
translation.es: Las armas confiscadas a un menor que es arrestado

translation.en: shall be considered forfeit to the township.
This is the last straw. No, wait. No.
translation.es: Esto es el colmo. No, espera.

translation.en: Listen, look. - The Battle of the Bands is on Friday-- - Not for you it ain't!
translation.es: - La Batalla de las Bandas es el viernes… - ¡Tú no irás!

translation.en: I don't have a bathing suit.
Every time I see you, you are wasted.
translation.es: Cada vez que te veo, estás ebrio.

translation.en: Hey, let me try your glasses.
I saw Timothée Chalamet wearing glasses like this on Insta once.
translation.es: Una vez vi a Timothée Chalamet con lentes así en Insta.

translation.en: I like Call Me by Your Name.
translation.es: Me gusta Llámame por tu nombre.

translation.en: My cousin in Santa Barbara totally fucked him.
translation.es: Mi prima de Santa Bárbara se acostó con él.

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. Well, I don't even know your name.
translation.es: Bueno, ni siquiera sé tu nombre.

translation.en: Yo, dude. What, are you waiting for a tutorial?
Come on, man. What about Emily? They've got a real relationship.
translation.es: Vamos, amigo. ¿Y Emily? Es una relación de verdad

translation.en: One built on trust and emotional honesty.
translation.es: basada en la confianza y la sinceridad.

translation.en: And this? I mean, come on, dude. What's really going on here?
translation.es: ¿Y esto? Por favor, amigo. ¿Qué pasa aquí?

translation.en: Hold on, Tom. Kendall's a person too.
translation.es: Espera, Tom. Kendall también es una persona. Le gusta Kevin.

translation.en: She likes Kevin. She's making her desires known.
translation.es: Kendall también es una persona. Le gusta Kevin. Expresa sus deseos. No tiene nada de malo.

translation.en: There's absolutely nothing wrong with that.
translation.es: Expresa sus deseos. No tiene nada de malo.

translation.en: Yeah, maybe, but Emily's really loyal. This would ruin her.
translation.es: Sí, pero Emily es muy leal. La destrozaría.

translation.en: Back in the day, we all got up to stuff.
He's only a drummer. He should have what he wants.
translation.es: Es un baterista. Debe tener lo que quiere.

translation.en: If he's in that hot tub, he'll have what he gets.
translation.es: Y si se mete ahí, tendrá lo que hay.

translation.en: A year ago, I didn't know who these guys were.
translation.es: Hace un año, no sabía quiénes eran.

translation.en: But now, after a bottle of champagne, they're all making some really good points.
translation.es: Y luego de una botella de champaña, tienen mucha razón.

translation.en: You found someone who loves you.
translation.es: Hallaste a alguien que te ama.

translation.en: Then, don't be an asshole, Kevin.
Thank you, Rob Halford of Judas Priest.
translation.es: Gracias, Rob Halford de Judas Priest.

translation.en: You don't turn your back on the people who love you.
translation.es: No se abandona a los que te aman.

translation.en: You don't have to. I want to.
I've been looking for this for, like, forever.
- I found it. - What? Give me that.
You wouldn't even know about Lamb of God if it wasn't for me?
translation.es: Conoces a Lamb of God gracias a mí.

translation.en: Listen, I've got to get out of here immediately. I've got this important--
translation.es: Debo irme de inmediato. Tengo que…

translation.en: We are doing a preliminary eval on you, right?
Dude. Dude, you guys were gods.
- I-- I go to Glenwood Lake High, man. - I see that.
translation.es: - Voy a la preparatoria Glenwood Lake. - Ya veo.

translation.en: - So you're a doctor now? - Yeah.
Place like this saved me from a slow fucking suicide,
translation.es: Este lugar me salvó de un lento suicidio.

translation.en: so I went back to school, got my Psy D.
Give something back, that kind of shit.
translation.es: Así podía devolver algo y esas cosas.

translation.en: They wouldn't practice, wouldn't learn the songs.
translation.es: No ensayaban, no aprendían las canciones.

translation.en: - So that's why you broke up? - That was part of it.
translation.es: - ¿Por eso se separaron? - En parte sí.

translation.en: But mostly it was because those guys were fuck- holes.
translation.es: Más que nada porque eran unos idiotas.

translation.en: They wouldn't go an inch out of their own way for anybody but themselves.
translation.es: No hacían nada por nadie, solo por ellos mismos.

translation.en: Look, if you're gonna record with people, you're gonna tour with people,
translation.es: Si grabas con alguien, deben salir de gira

translation.en: you're gonna spend all day, every day, with them for years,
translation.es: y pasar juntos todo el santo día durante años,

translation.en: you sure as shit better like hanging out with them.
Otherwise, your life is gonna suck.
translation.es: Si no, tu vida será una mierda.

translation.en: Then you're gonna start drinking to forget how bad your life sucks,
translation.es: Comenzarás a beber para olvidar tu vida de mierda

translation.en: I get this kind of shit all the time. Okay, come on.
translation.es: Me vienen con estas cosas siempre. Bien, ven.

translation.en: He's a mess. He and I have a lot of work to do.
translation.es: Es un desastre. Tenemos mucho en qué trabajar.

translation.en: Which is why I can't babysit your ass just because you like brutal fucking music.
translation.es: No puedo cuidarte solo porque te guste la música pesada.
Recomendaré que te den el alta.

translation.en: The board will follow my recommendations. They always do.
translation.es: La junta siempre sigue mis recomendaciones.

translation.en: - I scare the shit out of them. - Thank you, man. Thank you.
translation.es: Me tienen miedo. - Gracias, viejo. - De nada.

translation.en: No problem. We will have you out of here by Monday.
translation.es: - Gracias, viejo. - De nada. Te irás el lunes.

translation.en: They review recommendations over the weekend.
translation.es: Lo evalúan los fines de semana.

translation.en: Okay. Um, is there any way we could get that review done tonight?
translation.es: ¿Hay alguna manera de que lo hagan esta noche?

translation.en: They're already driving home in their Jaguars listening to Sting. Why?
translation.es: Ya se fueron en sus Jaguar escuchando a Sting. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: The Battle of the Bands is tomorrow, and my band is totally poised to win.
translation.es: Mañana es la Batalla de las Bandas, y mi banda puede ganar.

translation.en: Fucking Battle of the motherfucking Bands.
translation.es: La maldita Batalla de las Bandas.

translation.en: Anyway, give you another year to practice.
Yeah, are we going to practice before?
No? Okay. No. We don't need to. It's fine.
translation.es: ¿No? Bien. No es necesario. Está bien.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll see you at 7:00 at the cafeteria.
translation.es: Sí, nos vemos a las 7:00 en la cafetería.

translation.en: It's Hunter. I'm not here. Deal.
Who the fuck calls on a landline?
translation.es: ¿Quién diablos llama al teléfono de casa?

translation.en: No, Hunter isn't here right now.
I feel like this is his way of begging me to come back to the band.
translation.es: Siento que esta es su forma de rogarme que vuelva a la banda.

translation.en: There's definitely something wrong with him. He's shitty to everyone.
translation.es: Algo le pasa. Es agresivo con todos.

translation.en: Even you. You're supposed to be his best friend.
translation.es: Incluso contigo que, supuestamente, eres su amigo.

translation.en: You said it yourself, he's a massive dick.
translation.es: Tú mismo dijiste que era un idiota.

translation.en: I would have never understood what a massive dick he is if it wasn't for you.
translation.es: Jamás hubiera entendido lo idiota que es de no ser por ti.

translation.en: And I wouldn't have met you if it wasn't for metal,
translation.es: De no ser por el metal, no te conocería,

translation.en: and I wouldn't have thought about metal for five seconds if it wasn't for Hunter.
translation.es: y no me gustaría el metal de no ser por Hunter.

translation.en: I gotta get him out of there.
Wait, so first you tell me that I should hate him,
and now you want me to help him?
translation.es: y ahora quieres que lo ayude?

translation.en: Uh, you'd sort of be helping me help him.
No, I can't! Not after what he did.
translation.es: ¡No puedo! No después de lo que me hizo.

translation.en: You don't have to. It's okay. I mean it.
translation.es: No hace falta. Está bien, en serio.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, I… I hope so.
My best friend, he's-- he's got problems. He's a, uh…
- Turpentine, butane, propane? - Yep, yep, yep, all those.
He mixes them, and his parents don't know what to do,
translation.es: Los mezcla, y sus padres no saben qué hacer.

translation.en: so I wanted to get them a brochure.
translation.es: Así que quería llevarles un folleto.

translation.en: You're a good friend. They're right back there.
translation.es: Eres un buen amigo. Están ahí atrás.

translation.en: Wait right here. I'll get some more.
You four have outdone yourselves yet again.
It definitely looks like a party in here.
Now, before you tell us which dessert you're taking,
translation.es: Antes de decirnos qué postre elegirán,

translation.en: All right, you two, which dessert are you choosing?
Look, man, I gotta tell you, I'm just--
- I, uh… - Tell me later. Please. Come on.
You know Ray. He's the drummer from Mollycoddle.
translation.es: Ya conoces a Ray. Es el baterista de Mollycoddle.

translation.en: You do know we have to bring you back after Battle of the Bands?
translation.es: ¿Sabes que debes volver tras la Batalla?

translation.en: Can't deal on the outside. I don't have the coping mechanisms.
translation.es: No puedo con el exterior. No tengo el mecanismo apropiado.

translation.en: Okay, wait. How are we getting out?
- Let's go. Come on. - No running.
You'll never get clean articulation at high speeds with a pick this thin.
translation.es: No se logra buena articulación con una púa tan delgada.

translation.en: It's a real piece of shit.
You deserve a better best friend.
Yeah, probably, but you're the one I got.
translation.es: Quizá, pero eres el único que tengo.
No me lo digas a mí.

translation.en: You nearly cracked my fucking skull, dude.
And you put a really large dent in my guitar.
Your behavior has been violent and unpredictable.
translation.es: Tu comportamiento es violento e impredecible.

translation.en: So will you please, please, please,
translation.es: Así que te pido por favor…

translation.en: and come crack some fucking skulls with us at the Battle of the Bands?
translation.es: y rompas cráneos con nosotros en la Batalla de las Bandas.

translation.en: Mollycoddle, you guys are up next.
You guys have been great, and I'd love to play with you again, but…
translation.es: Fueron geniales conmigo, y quisiera tocar con ustedes…

translation.en: I can only be in one band.
translation.es: pero solo puedo estar en una banda.

translation.en: I feel you, man. It's all good.
translation.es: Te entiendo, viejo. Está todo bien.

translation.en: I've been meaning to apologize for what happened at my party.
translation.es: Quería disculparme por lo que pasó en mi fiesta.

translation.en: Yup, and I'm sorry about the things I said about your band.
translation.es: Sí, y lamento lo que dije de su banda.

translation.en: So may the best band win.
So you guys like a duo?
You're lucky to have this guy, man.
translation.es: Es una suerte contar con él.

translation.en: - I got a bottle of Jack in the new truck. - Let's go!
translation.es: Vamos, tengo una botella de whisky.

translation.en: Thank you, Glenwood Lake. GLHS is lit!
- I love you! - Nix was right about this pick.
translation.es: Nix tenía razón sobre la púa.

translation.en: I can do this. We're gonna crush this shit.
How will it sound with nothing on the bottom, no chords, no riff?
translation.es: Nada de fondo ni acordes ni riff…

translation.en: No, it-- it'll be like, uh…
Nope. That is not appropriate. It's got to go.
translation.es: Eso no es apropiado. Deben sacarlo.

translation.en: - - No, it can't go. It is painted on the heads.
translation.es: No se puede. Está pintado encima.

translation.en: Well, I can't let you bring those in there, so…
translation.es: No pueden entrar con eso ahí.

translation.en: - Eli, I need a favor. - Of course, Emily. What do you need?
translation.es: - Eli, necesito un favor. - Claro, Emily. ¿Qué necesitas?

translation.en: I need to get into the art room.
translation.es: Entrar en el salón de arte.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, a round of applause for Skullflower.
translation.es: Damas y caballeros, un aplauso para Skullflower.

translation.en: This is a little song… about…
translation.es: Esta es una canción sobre la maquinaria de tormento.
Que mis sueños se desangraran provocó.

translation.en: Father, Father Deaf to children's call…
translation.es: Padre, oh, padre, a sus hijos no escuchó…

translation.en: Hey, isn't that Hunter Sylvester and Kevin Schlieb?
translation.es: ¿No son Hunter Sylvester y Kevin Schlieb?

translation.en: And what's- her- name, the-- the shitty clarinetist.
translation.es: Y esa clarinetista que es un desastre.

translation.en: Could've been in a band with those guys.
I built it for you all
Your prom king crown's The first thing struck
translation.es: Tu corona de rey va a destrozar.

translation.en: Turned into a bucket of fuck
translation.es: A la basura la va a lanzar.

translation.en: I built it for every one of you
I built it for you all
I built it for you all
I built it for you  All
Hunter, don't look at your leg, okay?
translation.es: Hunter, no te mires la pierna, ¿sí?

translation.en: Gotta wiggle them. Come on, little fuckers.
- - Ow, dude. - Dude. - I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Sorry.
Silver medalists. We came in second.
Oh, hey, uh, looks like you're going viral.
Well… at least I didn't get arrested.

translation.es: No puede ser que hayamos perdido.

translation.en: They're nice guys. The people have spoken. This is what they want.
translation.es: Son buenos tipos. La gente lo decidió.
No, a la mierda con ellos.
A la mierda con cada uno.

translation.en: Who are people gonna remember? Us.
That is us right there, headlining.
- We were good. - No, we were fucking great.
Yes, she did. That was some Yo- Yo Ma shit.
- And your solo… - Holy fuck, that was unreal.

translation.es: ¿Qué me dices de este hijo de puta?

translation.en: Oh, my man slapped them in their faces with his double bass dick.
translation.es: Mi chico les refregó ese pito de doble bombo.

translation.en: Let them have their fads. Fads come and go.
translation.es: Que sigan con su moda, que va y viene.

translation.en: Now it starts for us. Now people know our name.
translation.es: Este es el principio. Ahora nos conocen.
